sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"热情"之意。
means: zeal ： 通常指为实现向往的事业或为达到所追求的目标而积极投身到实践活动中所表现出来的热情。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Lopez approached his task with a religious zeal.
sentence.Network_cn: 洛佩斯先生以宗教般的热诚对待工作。

sentence.Network_en: The reforms were carried out with an almost messianic zeal.
sentence.Network_cn: 改革是以极大的热情进行的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 公司起英文名-品牌起名-公司起名-猪八戒网 ... charm 魅力 ，迷人使陶醉 zeal 热情,热忱 Zing 真.
虞啸卿_百度百科 ... Yield（ 屈服） Zeal（ 热忱（zeal）） All（ 世界）.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... wary a 警惕的；谨慎的 zeal n 热心，一心一意 ablish v 废除.
符文之语_百度百科 ... +1 狂战士（ Berserk） +1 热诚（zeal）（ Zeal） Brand（ 品牌）.

list.abs: 牛津大学英语词典 ... religious zeal;devoutness 宗教热情; 虔诚: a life of great devotion 信仰诚笃的一生.
I never heard someone read a Snickers bar label with such zeal before .我此前从未听说一个人会如此热情地阅读士力架上的标签。
2010年3月4日 -  zeal din 狂热圣骑士热诚max 牺牲max 狂热max 圣盾max 藐视10 攻击时,左边热诚,右边狂热光环。我准备练的类型 【复仇进攻型】 魔法天使-复仇圣.
excess of zeal ruins peach - trees and apricot - trees ., 过分的热可以损害桃花和杏花.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via ecclesiastical Latin from Greek zēlos

entry.def: Zeal is great enthusiasm, especially in connection with work, religion, or politics.

example.ex: Mr Lopez approached his task with a religious zeal.
example.tran: 洛佩斯先生以宗教般的热诚对待工作。

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of strong eagerness (usually in favor of a person or cause);

sentences.sentence: "they were imbued with a revolutionary ardor"
"he felt a kind of religious zeal"

means.word_mean: 2. excessive fervor to do something or accomplish some end;

sentences.sentence: "he had an absolute zeal for litigation"

auth_sentence.content: I shall expect my wife anon, red-hot with zeal.
auth_sentence.res_content: I shall expect my wife anon, red-hot with zeal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I shall expect my wife anon, red-hot with zeal.

auth_sentence.content: His immoderate zeal against the unfortunate clan.
auth_sentence.res_content: His immoderate zeal against the unfortunate clan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His immoderate zeal against the unfortunate clan.

auth_sentence.content: Nor is it an uncommon thing to behold ignorance and zeal united in men.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor is it an uncommon thing to behold ignorance and zeal united in men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor is it an uncommon thing to behold ignorance and zeal united in men.

stems_affixes.word_buile: jeal=zeal热心+ous……的→对什么表示热心而无法得到,从而嫉妒
zeal热心+ous表形容词→adj.热心的,热情的
zeal热心+ot人→n.狂热分子,热心者

means.word_mean: 热心, 热忱, 热情

sentences.en: They worked with great zeal to finish the project.
sentences.cn: 他们热情高涨地工作, 以期完成这个项目。

jushi.english: They worked with great zeal to finish the project.
jushi.chinese: 他们热情高涨地工作，以期完成这个项目。
